Class Categories

  • java.lang.Object
    • Categories

  • public class Categories
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that can hold the categories of a Product. The categories can be accepted with a proper string form or in an arraylist form. The categories are held in an arraylist form. The categories can be converted into a proper string form if needed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Categories(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> theList)
      A constructor that retrieves the categories from the given arraylist
      Categories(java.lang.String stringForm)
      Pre: the string should be in a proper format example: "[""Blabla1 >> Blabla2 >> Blabla3""]" Blabla1, Blabla2, Blabla3 are set as the categories in the given order.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(java.lang.String searchedCat) 
      java.lang.String convertToText()
      Converts the categories in a text form

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Categories

        public Categories(java.lang.String stringForm)
        Pre: the string should be in a proper format example: "[""Blabla1 >> Blabla2 >> Blabla3""]" Blabla1, Blabla2, Blabla3 are set as the categories in the given order. A constructor that sets the categories by retrieving them from a string.
        Parameters:
        stringForm - is the given string.

        A constructor that retrieves the categories from the given arraylist
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • convertToText

        public java.lang.String convertToText()
        Converts the categories in a text form
        Returns:
        the text form of the categories

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String searchedCat)
        Returns:
        true if the searchedCat is one of the categories, false if not
